Subject: Unable to exclude unnecessary and excessive report logs
Description: Under content aware reports we get tens of thousands of redundant and excessive logs from temp outlook appdata files. We tried adding it as a file location in allowlist to prevent it from popping up in logs but to no avail. In addition, aside seeing emails with destination details, we also see the exact replicates without destination details which is causes more excessive logs.
What_We_Know__c:
5941 did not resolve the issue for the customer.

---
Under content aware reports, the customer gets tens of thousands of redundant and excessive logs from temp outlook appdata files. They tried adding it as a file location in allowlist and selecting the computers to prevent it from popping up in logs, but to no avail. In addition, aside from seeing emails with destination details, they also see the exact replicates without destination details.
They tried to add the file location in multiple ways, but it didn't help.
Next_Steps__c:
Customer ask us to wait till Friday or next week to get back to us.
